modName: Natural Children - RS Children and Vanilla
summary: Originally packed with Real Women of Skyrim, now released as it's own mod. This makes the children look more realistic and natural. NOT FOR EVERYONE.
descriptionHtml:
Kids are supposed to be cute and soft and squishy and edible!

[b]Not anymore![/b]

This makes children look more realistic. Immersive. And like they're living in an extremely cold environment with less to eat due to strife and civil war. Considering most are orphaned, I felt this was much more immersive.

[b][size=4]Compatible with all child replacers (RS Children, TK Children, Xvision Children, Dolls - Children Overhaul) as well as vanilla children, and 'new children'. Just pick the one you use in the downloads.

Dirty version also available in downloads.
(vanilla version does not replace body. Download 'new children' and let my files overwrite)

[/size][/b]I use RS Children, personally. And I absolutely love it! However, the skin just didn't match my skin overhaul at all. So, I fixed that!
There was an alpha version released with Real Women of Skyrim. This one is different, however shares the same concept. I realized that maybe MxR was right, and the children did look a little 'dead'. So I gave them a bit more color... But not enough to stray from what my mods are about: REALISM.Â 

Blah blah. I'm too tired to give an in depth description.

[size=4][b]This will make your children lore-friendly, and probably sick looking. But hey, it's realistic.[/b][/size]

[color=#ff7700][b]Don't think so?[/b][/color]
No one is forcing you to download this.

[b][color=#ff7700]Why do they have underwear on?[/color][/b]
So pedophiles like you don't wank it to 8 year olds.

[color=#ff7700][b]They're not cute and squishy anymore![/b][/color]
They haven't eaten anything in weeks because their parents were killed by imperials.

[color=#ff7700][b]Why do they look like skooma heads?[/b][/color]
They probably are.
[b][color=#ff7700]
This isn't realistic! No one looks like that![/color][/b]
I took pictures of [b]MYSELF[/b] and used them as stock in creating [b]ALL[/b] of my textures. [b]IT'S LITERALLY MY OWN FACE WITHOUT MAKEUP, TWEAKED TO FIT THE TEXTURES.[/b]

I don't feel like explaining myself anymore. Don't like it? Don't download it. Simple as that. People like different things. You like your barbie mods? Some people don't. This is a FREE mod. No one is forcing you to download anything. I spent YEARS creating these to release FOR FREE. I could just as easily charge for it somewhere else, but I choose not to. I work a full time job, a full time apprenticeship, and go to school full time. Yet I spend [b][i]every bit[/i][/b] of my free time doing this for people who actually want to use it. The hate I've received for creating these textures is exhausting.
There's also a function to only show 'not lore-friendly' mods. I suggest you use it.

However, the love I've received has made it all worth-while... So thank you. Those of you who enjoy using my textures make everything I do have meaning. You encourage me to never give up doing what I love.

[b][u]Have actual constructive feedback? Suggestions? Requests? Want to offer help? Leave a comment in the corresponding forum topic (up top, click "Forum")




[/u][/b]By the way... I'm female. Not that it matters, but being called a dude is weird.
author: Gearhog
